alert.note: Alert for Finney; Lane; Scott (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 18 at 9:14PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 AM CDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Kansas and west central Kansas, including the following counties, in southwest Kansas, Finney. In west central Kansas, Lane and Scott. * WHEN...Until 315 AM CDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 914 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the warned area. Between 1 and 2.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are possible in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Scott City, Dighton, Alamota, Grigston, Manning, Amy, Healy, Shallow Water, Shields, Scott State Lake, Modoc and Pendennis. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
